title: Old PC emails
content: I have a new PC. After installing Thunderbird onto my new PC, emails from my old PC are not there. Can these be recovered? I have a copy of my old PC hard drive files but not the actual PC. Thanks Jim Ferrier
creator: sales388

title: Mail server responds: mfrm-502 and blocks my sending emails
content: My email has been spoofed, but I still want to send email messages. How do I tell Thunderbird to allow me to do this?
creator: MichaelEric
